sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const CreateChilling = (props) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(props.title); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date()); const [people, setPeople] = useState(0); const [duration, setDuration] = useState(0); const [language, setLanguage] = useState("English"); const [country, setCountry] = useState("United Kingdom"); const [note, setNote] = useState(""); const [peopleError, setPeopleError] = useState(false); const [durationError, setDurationError] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (isNaN(parseInt(people)) || isNaN(parseInt(duration))) { if (isNaN(parseInt(people))) { setPeopleError(true); } else { setPeopleError(false); } if (isNaN(parseInt(duration))) { setDurationError(true); } else { setDurationError(false); } } else { setDurationError(false); setPeopleError(false); const chilling = { title: props.title, netflixid: parseInt(props.nid), username: username, pass: "legooo", date: date, people: parseInt(people), duration: parseInt(duration), language: language, country: country, note: note, }; axios .post("http://localhost:5000/chillings/add", chilling) .then((res) => props.getAdded(true)); setUsername(""); setDate(new Date()); setPeople(0); setDuration(0); setLanguage(""); setCountry(""); setNote(""); window.scroll({ bottom: 0, left: 0, behavior: "smooth", }); } }; const onChangeDate = (date) => { setDate(date); }; return (

Create New Chilling

Title: setTitle(e.target.value)} width="10rem" readOnly="readonly" /> Username: setUsername(e.target.value)} placeholder="Username" required /> {/* {usernameError &&

Please enter a username

} */} The username you want to be displayed in the chilling info. Date:
Number of people: setPeople(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Number of People" /> Number of expected participants. {peopleError &&

Please enter a number not a string

} Duration (in minutes): setDuration(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Time Duration" /> {durationError &&

Please enter a number not a string

} Language: Country: Different countries have different Netflix title availabilities. Note: setNote(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Note" required /> Enter contact detials or zoom link.
); }; export default CreateChilling;
